Hi do you think we can appeal my ad named: newman_V1 Ad ID:1915212343163129858

Hi Francisco, I'm here to help! To appeal your ad rejection, I recommend checking out our policy document for detailed guidelines on the appeal process. You can find it here: [Ad Policy and Standards](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/sections/24753741763085-Ad-Policy-and-Standards). If you need further assistance, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your ad details and the reason for the appeal.
